# 8.0 Docs

## Globalization

- [Date and time converters honor culture argument](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/globalization/8.0/typeconverter-cultureinfo.md): Learn about the globalization breaking change in .NET 8 where the type converters for date and time types use the argument-specified culture to format the date and time.
- [TwoDigitYearMax default is 2049](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/globalization/8.0/twodigityearmax-default.md): Learn about the globalization breaking change in .NET 8 where the default value of the TwoDigitYearMax property for Gregorian calendars has changed from 2029 to 2049.
